sentence.Network_en: Induct electric power cable , shell up the destine length.
sentence.Network_cn: 引入电力电缆, 在预定长度剥开.

sentence.Network_en: This paper induct the major benefits of using spodumene in sanitaryware glaze.

sentence.Network_en: A flock of players form an organization, induct other player initiate ceaselessly.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin induct- 'led into', from the verb inducere (see induce)

entry.tran: 使正式就任;赋予头衔;给予职位
entry.def: If someone is inducted into a particular job, rank, or position, they are given the job, rank, or position in a formal ceremony.

example.ex: Six new members have been inducted into the Provincial Cabinet...
example.tran: 6 名新成员已经正式加入省内阁班子。

example.ex: She inducts Nina into the cult.
example.tran: 她诱导尼娜加入这一邪教。

entry.def: If someone is inducted into the army, they are officially made to join the army.

example.ex: In December he was inducted into the army.

means.word_mean: 1. place ceremoniously or formally in an office or position;

sentences.sentence: "there was a ceremony to induct the president of the Academy"

means.word_mean: 2. accept young people into society, usually with some rite;

sentences.sentence: "African men are initiated when they reach puberty"
"We were inducted into the honor society"

means.word_mean: 4. produce electric current by electrostatic or magnetic processes

sentences.sentence: "The young geisha was inducted into the ways of her profession"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易拉长的,易变形的,可塑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: duct引导,带来+ile能……的→能引导的→可塑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ive……的→adj.生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
via路+duct引导,带来→引导路的路
con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
stems_affixes.word_buile: educt=educe[v.引出;演绎]+ion表名词→n.引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ivity表名词→n.生产率
seduct=seduce[v.勾引,诱惑]+ion动作或状态→n.诱惑
vent风,通风+i+duct引导,带来→引导通风

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥
in进入+duct引导,带来→引进→引导

sentences.en: Mr. John was inducted into the office of governor.
sentences.cn: 约翰先生正式就任州长。
